Name: Bubble Tea : game for thinking and imagination
About the game: Have you ever drink bubble tea? It's the Taiwan national drink with milk tea and chewy round beads. Made from tapioca flour That most people call 'bubble' in it In this game you will embark on an adventurous journey. Go find the legendary bubble milk tea for your grandfather. On the way, you encounter many puzzles and dangers. Good Luck ============================================================ About This Game - Have fun with game that made from RPG Maker Mv - Walk around the map to explore the world wide - Collect item from the scenes to solve puzzles - Use 100% 200% 300% of your brain - Fight with enemies like turn-based rpg game - Meet NPC character - Deadly trap that invite you to load save
